label: Grid Format Standard
prompt_text: Create a PROFESSIONAL 3x2 GRID CONTACT SHEET with exactly 6 images. Resolution: 8K. All frames must be identical in size and perfectly aligned with thin 2px grid dividers between frames.
constraints: All frames identical in size and perfectly aligned

label: Visual Consistency
prompt_text: Maintain absolute visual consistency across all frames. Same lighting setup, same color grading, same level of detail, and same professional quality in every frame.
constraints: Same level of detail and sharpness

label: Identity Lock
prompt_text: When a reference image is provided, maintain exact identity consistency. Same face, same proportions, same features, same skin texture. No drift, no redesign, no variation in core identity.
constraints: Exact identity match to reference image

label: Clean Output
prompt_text: Output must be clean and professional with no distractions. No visible text, labels, numbers, captions, watermarks, or overlays of any kind.
constraints: No visible text, labels, numbers, captions, or overlays

label: Technical Specifications
prompt_text: All outputs must meet professional technical standards. High resolution (8K), proper exposure, accurate colors, sharp focus where intended, and proper depth of field control.
